description:
Vovsoft Website File Collector is a powerful Windows application designed to simplify file downloads from websites.

Vovsoft Website File Collector is a powerful Windows application designed to simplify file downloads from websites. Whether you need documents, images, scripts, or media files, the software enables you to gather the resources you need quickly and efficiently.

With an easy-to-use interface, you can enter a website URL or multiple URLs, specify the file types youâ€™re interested in (such as PDF, DOC, JPG, CSS, JS files, or any custom file extensions), and let the software do the rest. This program scans the entire site, locating every file that matches your criteria. Once the scan is complete, the application displays a detailed list of downloadable URLs, providing you with a clear view of available files before download. You can choose to export the file list or download them all.

Key features:
- Targeted File Search: Specify exact file types or extensions you want to find.
- Comprehensive URL Listing: View a complete list of matching file URLs on the site before downloading, allowing you to inspect and select files as needed.
- Batch Downloading: Download all files in one go or export the list and selectively choose which files to save to your device.
- User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive controls make file collection straightforward for beginners and advanced users alike.
- Time-Saving Efficiency: Quickly gather resources from websites, saving you from manual downloads and browsing.

Website File Collector is perfect for students, researchers, web developers, and anyone needing an efficient way to retrieve large quantities of files from the web. Say goodbye to repetitive downloads and hello to an organized, all-in-one file collection solution.
